subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Zach Marbury, a point guard like his brother Stephon, has agreed to play basketball in Venezuela, a deal he hopes will lead to an invitation to N.B.A. training camp.
snippet: Zach Marbury, a point guard like his brother Stephon, has agreed to play basketball in Venezuela, a deal he hopes will lead to an invitation to N.B.A. training camp.
